afanimation
====

#Overview

## Description
 This is a simple python loading animation including funny expression.
 You can make people waiting completion of tasks less bored.

## Requirement
 * Module
     *  enum
 
 * Environment
   + Python 2.7 or above.
   
## Usage
    import afanimation
    a = afanimation.Animation()
    a.start()
    ....Some loading tasks....
    a.stop()

## Install
 pip install afanimation
